sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>getUserData</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
	 // Instantiate the GetEmailAddress Script Include 
    var getEmailAddr = new GlideAjax('GetUserData');
    getEmailAddr.addParam('sysparm_name','getEmail');
    
    getEmailAddr.getXML(populateEmailField);

    // When the response is back from the server
    function populateEmailField(response){
        // Extract the email address from the response
        var emailFromScriptInclude = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		emailFromScriptInclude = JSON.parse(emailFromScriptInclude);
		
		console.log(emailFromScriptInclude);
        //g_form.clearValue('u_requested_for_email');
        //g_form.setValue('u_requested_for_email',emailFromScriptInclude);
		g_form.addInfoMessage("e-mail: " + emailFromScriptInclude);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-13 19:16:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>44fa41fa1bb33300505640c6cc4bcbaa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getUserData</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_44fa41fa1bb33300505640c6cc4bcbaa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-17 14:46:28</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="VS Active User Info">d67149761bb33300505640c6cc4bcbed</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
